The only possible disease-related entity in the paragraph is "W474C alpha-subunit". It is mentioned as having an abnormal accumulation of precursor levels compared to the normal alpha-subunit precursor levels. However, it's important to note that "W474C alpha-subunit" is not a well-known disease but could be a specific genetic mutation or a protein abnormality.
